summary: This introduces Zayid a Redguard follower to the Bannered Mare in Whiterun.
descriptionHtml:
[font=Comic Sans MS][color=#ff0000][size=5]Zayid the Redguard Adventurer

[/size][/color][/font][size=4][font=Times New Roman][color=#ffffff]This mod introduces Zayid, a Redguard mercenary to Skyrim. You can find him at the Bannered Mare in Whiterun. 

Zayid comes wielding a Dwarven Greatsword, and his own styled-Orcish armor with unique enchantment. Zayid uses a two-handed warrior fighting style (Farkas, Bandit bosses, etc), he is also adept at two-handed fighting and heavy armor and has perks-related to those areas. 

[/color][/font][font=Times New Roman][color=#ffffff]Please refer to the 'instructions' readme and the required mods section to find out what you will need for this mod to work. 

[/color][/font][/size][i][size=4]1.2 UPDATE Zayid is now completely standalone (asides from the requisite DLC), and his files are now conveniently packaged into .bsa format. Ran through Tes5Edit and playtested![/size][/i]
[font=Tahoma][color=#ffff00][size=3]
[/size][/color][/font][font=Comic Sans MS][color=#ff0000][size=5]Features:[/size][/color][/font]

[list]
[*][font=Times New Roman][color=#ffffff][size=4]Marriageable [/size][/color][/font]
[*][font=Times New Roman][color=#ffffff][size=4]Housecarl for Hearthfires[/size][/color][/font]
[*][font=Times New Roman][color=#ffffff][size=4]Steward for Hearthfires[/size][/color][/font]
[*][font=Times New Roman][color=#ffffff][size=4]Lightfoot (will not set off traps)[/size][/color][/font]
[*][font=Times New Roman][color=#ffffff][size=4]Essential (cannot be killed)[/size][/color][/font]
[*][font=Times New Roman][color=#ffffff][size=4]Unique Orcish default armor & weapon[/size][/color][/font]
[/list]
[font=Comic Sans MS][color=#ff0000][size=5]Credits [/size][/color][/font]

[font=Times New Roman][color=#ffffff][size=4]Big thanks goes to 

[/size][/color][/font][list]
[*][font=Times New Roman][color=#ffffff][size=4][url=https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/68311/]Kalilies[/url]﻿ & Stealthic for KS Hairdo's Renewal [/size][/color][/font]
[*][font=Times New Roman][color=#ffffff][size=4][url=https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/66630]Lokels[/url]﻿ for 'Loks Eyes'[/size][/color][/font]
[/list]
author: AedanStarfang

files.name: Zayid Redguard Adventurer
files.changelogHtml:
Added Zayid's default outfit & weapon
Fixed Zayid's faction status
Tweaked Zayid's level growth stats
Made Zayid standalone
Archived entirety of files into .bsa
